name: Custom Robo V2
overview: Custom Robo V2 (カスタムロボV２, Kasutamu Robo Buitsū) is an Action-RPG developed by Noise and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo 64 as a Japanese exclusive. It is the second title of the Custom Robo series, and the predecessor of Custom Robo for the Nintendo GameCube. The gameplay of Custom Robo V2 is similar to any ordinary RPG: players walk around in an overworld, then engage in battles. However, the game differs from the traditional RPG mold by having a real time battle system. The goal of the game is to win battles to obtain better Robos and parts to improve your combat abilities.
